title: How long does it take the boards to register the fact I've been over level 7 for two days to post?
body:
I find it rather aggravating as I'm level 10 now and nope, nada, nothing. I know many games have this sort of co-dependency of posting on their relative forums but I have never had to wait more than a few hours AT MOST on those.

Clarity, please?

replies.body: Sometimes the levels just don't sync up correctly with your Summoner Level is all! Usually posting here does the trick, but I went ahead and pushed through a quick sync for you to be sure.

Try the boards syncing tool here:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/6JI91pva-boards-profile-syncing-tool

That should fix it.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
